summary: This bill, the Supporting Early-childhood Educators’ Deductions Act of 2025 (SEED Act of 2025), amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow early childhood educators to take the educator expense deduction. It modifies Section 62 of the code to include early childhood educators in the deduction, expanding the eligibility criteria to include those working with pre-kindergarten students and making the changes effective for expenses incurred after December 31, 2024.
